title: Mundhinam Parthene Song Lyrics Vaaranam Aayiram
stanzas: <div>Mundhinam Parthene Song Lyrics Vaaranam Aayiram

Mundhinam paarthene
paarthadhum thotreney
salladai kannaaga
nenjamum pun aanadhe

iththanai naalaaga
unnai naan paaraamal
engu naan poneno
naatkalum veen aanadhe

vaanathil nee vennilaa
yaekkathil naan theivathaa

ippodhe ennodu vanthaal enna
oor paarka ondraaga
sendraal enna (2)

Mundhinam paarthene
paarthadhum thotreney
salladai kannaaga
nenjamum pun aanadhe

iththanai naalaaga
unnai naan paaraamal
engu naan poneno
naatkalum veen aanadhe

thulaa thattil unnai vaithu
nigar seiyya ponnai vaithaai
thulavaram thorkkaatho
paerazhage

mugam paarthu pesum unnai
mudhal kadhal sindhum kannai
anaikkaamal poveno aaruyire

oh nizhal pola vidaamal unnai
thodarvenadi
pugai pola padaamal pattu
nagarvenadi

vinaa nooru kanavu nooru
vidai solladi..

Mundhinam paarthene
paarthadhum thotreney
salladai kannaaga
ullamum pun aanadhe

iththanai naalaaga
(oh my love)
unnai naan paaraamal
(yes my love)
engu naan poneno
naatkalum veen aanadhe

Kadal neelam mangum neram
alai vandhu theendum thooram
manam sendru pogaatho eerathile

thalai saaikka tholum thandhaai
viral korthu pakkam vandhaai
idhazh mattum innum yen
dhoorathile.

pagal neram kanaakkal kanden
urangaamale
uyir rendum uraiya kanden
nerungaamale

unai andri enakku yaedhu
edhirkaalame

Mundhinam paarthene
paarthadhum thotreney
salladai kannaaga
nenjamum pun aanadhe

iththanai naalaaga
unnai naan paaraamal
engu naan poneno
naatkalum veen aanadhe

vaanathil nee vennilaa
yaekkathil naan theivathaa

ippodhe ennodu vanthaal enna
oor paarka ondraaga
sendraal enna (2)

vennilaaa
***************
nenjukkul peidhidum maa mazhai
neerukul moozhgidum thaamarai
sattendru maarudhu vaanilai
penne un mel pizhai

nillamal veesidum paeralai
nenjukkul neenthidum thaaragai
pon vannam soodiya kaarigai
penne nee kaanchanai

oh shaanthi shaanti oh shaanthi
yen uyirai uyirai neeyenthi
yen sendraai sendraai ennai thaandi
ini neethan enthan andhaathi

nenjukkul peidhidum maa mazhai
neerukul moozhgidum thaamarai
sattendru maarudhu vaanilai
penne un mel pizhai

yedho ondru ennai eerkka
mookin nuni marmam saerkka
kallathanam yethum illaa
punnagaiyo bogan villaa

nee nindra idam endraal
vilai yeri pogaadho
nee sellum vazhiellam
panikatti aahadho

ennodu vaa veedu varaikkum
en veettai paar ennai pidikkum

ival yaaro yaaro theriyaadhe
ival pinnal nenje pogaadhe
idhu pyyo meiyyo theriyaadhe
ival pinnal nenje pogaadhe

nenjukkul peidhidum maa mazhai
neerukul moozhgidum thaamarai
sattendru maarudhu vaanilai
penne un mel pizhai

thookangalai thooki sendraai
yaekkangalai thoovi sendraai
unnai thaandi pogum podhu
veesum kaattrin veechu veru

nil endru nee sonnal
en kaalam nagaradhe
nee soodum poovellam
oru podhum udhiradhe

kadhal enai ketkka villai
Kettaal adhu kadhal illai

en jeevan jeevan neethane
ena thondrum neram idhuthane
nee illai illai endrale
en nenjam nenjam thaangadhe

nenjukkul peidhidum maa mazhai
neerukul moozhgidum thaamarai
sattendru maarudhu vaanilai
penne un mel pizhai

nillamal veesidum peralai
nenjukkul neenthidum tharagai
pon vannam soodiya kaarigai
penne nee kaanchanai

oh shaanthi shaanti oh shaanthi
yen uyirai uyirai neeyenthi
yen sendraai sendraai yennai thaandi
ini neethan yenthan andhaathi
